data.name: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE: WORLD BROTHERS - Additional Character: Riho Futaba, Cool Summer Outfit
data.detailed_description: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is now joining the EDF as a playable character. Her Cool Summer Outfit allows her to stay cool while defending the Earth, no matter how intense the battle gets.
data.about_the_game: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is now joining the EDF as a playable character. Her Cool Summer Outfit allows her to stay cool while defending the Earth, no matter how intense the battle gets.
